mongodb.title: DATABASE LOGICAL SCHEMA TRANSFORMATION: FROM RELATIONAL (T-SQL) MODEL TO DOCUMENT-ORIENTED MONGODB
mongodb.abstract: Since there is no unique way to present part of the data to the user, there is no one way to model databases. It is necessary to understand the problem that the application solves and how it will produce, consume and process data. This paper will present the transformation of logical schemas from relational databases to schema-less document-oriented databases.

unittesting.title: BEST PRACTICES IN WRITING UNIT TESTS FOR .NET FRAMEWORK
unittesting.abstract: Unit tests are a basic tool for every programmer, and the goal of unit testing is to isolate each part of the program and show that individual parts are correct. A unit test provides a written contract that a piece of code must satisfy, in addition to providing several other benefits.
